titles.title: A concurrent resolution commemorating the 100th Anniversary of the 1915 Panama-California Exposition and the establishment of Balboa Park in San Diego, California.
A concurrent resolution commemorating the 100th Anniversary of the 1915 Panama-California Exposition and the establishment of Balboa Park in San Diego, California.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary: Commemorates the 100th anniversary of the Panama-California Exposition and the founding of Balboa Park in San Diego, California, on May 9, 2015.
